Module it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is24am03.server.model.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
This class is used to handle the main logic of a Game

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int nPlayers, String host)
    Constructor of the Game objects, it initializes all the attributes and add the host to the game

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int nPlayers, String host)
      Constructor of the Game objects, it initializes all the attributes and add the host to the game
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - is the total number of the players for the game
      host - is the Player that have created the game

  • Method Details

    • getGameSubs

      public ArrayList<GameSub> getGameSubs()

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      This method is used to start the game, it chooses randomly a starting player, distributes the cards to the players, initializes the common objective cards, shuffles the decks and reveals the first four cards on the table

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      This method is used to enter the game in the ending phase, in which points from objective cards are giver to the players and the winner is calculated

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()

    • setCommonObjective

      public void setCommonObjective()
      This method set the two common cards of the game

    • distributeCards

      public void distributeCards()
      This method give to each player the starting card, two resource card and one gold card

    • initializeTable

      public void initializeTable()
      Method that set the first four cards revealed on the table

    • checkWinner

      public ArrayList<Player> checkWinner()
      Method used to calculate the winner of the game
      Returns:
      an arraylist containing reference to the winning players

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String player)
      This method allow to add a player to the game
      Parameters:
      player - represent the player to be added

    • giveObjectivePoints

      public void giveObjectivePoints()
      This method calculates the number of objective card realized by each player and gives to them the corresponding points

    • drawResources

      public void drawResources(String player)
      Add a resource card to the selected player
      Parameters:
      player - represents the player who is drawing

    • drawGold

      public void drawGold(String player)
      Add a gold card to the selected player
      Parameters:
      player - represents the player who is drawing

    • drawTable

      public void drawTable(String player, int choice)
      This method lets the player drawing from the table selecting one of the four unrevealed cards
      Parameters:
      player - represents the player who is drawing
      choice - consists of the card chosen among the four cards on the table

    • handledrawTable

      public void handledrawTable(Deck d, ResourceCard resourceCard, int index, int deck)
      Handles updating all subscribed game clients with changes to the common table.
      Parameters:
      d - The deck from which the card is drawn.
      resourceCard - The resource card drawn.
      index - The index where the resource card is placed on the common table.
      deck - Indicates which deck the card is drawn from (0 for resource deck, 1 for gold deck).

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(String player, int choice, int i, int j, boolean face)
      This method allows to place a card
      Parameters:
      player - consists of the player who is placing
      choice - consists of the card to be placed
      i - consists of the vertical position in the player's board
      j - consists of the horizontal position in the player's board
      face - consists of the face of the card chosen by the player

    • setOrder

      public void setOrder()
      Set the order of the players used for the game

    • getGameState

      public State getGameState()
      Retrieves the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      The current state of the game.

    • selectStartingFace

      public void selectStartingFace(String player, boolean face)
      Allows a player to select a starting face for their player board.
      Parameters:
      player - The nickname of the player making the selection.
      face - The face (true/false) selected by the player.

    • setObjectiveCard

      public void setObjectiveCard(String player, int choice)
      Sets the objective card choice for a player and notifies the appropriate subscriber.
      Parameters:
      player - The nickname of the player setting the objective card.
      choice - The index of the objective card choice.

    • setColor

      public void setColor(Color color)
      Sets the pawn color for the current player and updates available colors. Notifies subscribers if in the COLOR state.
      Parameters:
      color - The color to set as the player's pawn color.

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Retrieves the list of players currently participating in the game.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing all players in the game.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Method used to change the current player to the next one

      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the available colors.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public int getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the index of the current player in the game.
      Returns:
      The index of the current player.

    • setEnding

      public void setEnding()
      Sets the game ending flag to true. This is typically used to indicate that the game is ending or has ended.

    • getGoldDeck

      public GoldDeck getGoldDeck()
      Retrieves the gold deck used in the game.
      Returns:
      The GoldDeck object representing the deck of gold cards.

      Returns:
      The ResourceDeck object representing the deck of resource cards.

    • isEnding

      public boolean isEnding()
      Checks if the game ending flag is set.
      Returns:
      true if the game ending flag is set; otherwise, false.

    • isLastRound

      public boolean isLastRound()
      Checks if the game is in the last round.
      Returns:
      true if it is the last round of the game; otherwise, false.

    • setLastRound

      public void setLastRound()
      Sets the flag indicating that the game is in the last round to true.

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState(State state)
      Sets the current state of the game.
      Parameters:
      state - The state to set for the game.

    • addSub

      public void addSub(GameSub gameSub)
      Adds a GameSub subscriber to the game.
      Parameters:
      gameSub - The GameSub object to add as a subscriber.

    • removeSub

      public void removeSub(GameSub gameSub)
      Removes a GameSub subscriber from the game.
      Parameters:
      gameSub - The GameSub object to remove as a subscriber.

    • addSub

      public void addSub(PlayerSub playerSub)
      Adds a PlayerSub subscriber to all players in the game and sets up subscriptions according to game state rules.
      Parameters:
      playerSub - The PlayerSub object to add as a subscriber.

    • removeSub

      public void removeSub(PlayerSub playerSub)
      Removes a PlayerSub subscriber from all players in the game.
      Parameters:
      playerSub - The PlayerSub object to remove as a subscriber.

    • addSub

      public void addSub(PlayerBoardSub playerBoardSub)

      playerBoardSub - The PlayerBoardSub object to add as a subscriber.

      public void removeSub(PlayerBoardSub playerBoardSub)

    • sendPrivateMessage

      public void sendPrivateMessage(String sender, String receiver, String message)
      Sends a private message from one player to another.
      Parameters:
      sender - The nickname of the sender of the message.
      receiver - The nickname of the receiver of the message.
      message - The content of the private message.

    • sendGroupMessage

      public void sendGroupMessage(String sender, String message)
      Sends a group message to all players in the game.
      Parameters:

      message - The content of the group message.

    • findSub

      public PlayerSub findSub(Player p)
      Finds the corresponding PlayerSub subscriber for a given Player.
      Parameters:
      p - The Player object for which to find the PlayerSub subscriber.
      Returns:
      The PlayerSub object associated with the given Player, or null if not found.

    • findSub

      public PlayerSub findSub(String nickname)
      Finds the corresponding PlayerSub subscriber for a player with the given nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player for which to find the PlayerSub subscriber.
      Returns:
      The PlayerSub object associated with the player's nickname, or null if not found.

    • findPlayer

      public Player findPlayer(String player)
      Finds and retrieves the player object corresponding to the given nickname.
      Parameters:
      player - The nickname of the player to find.
      Returns:
      The Player object associated with the given nickname, or null if not found.

    • manageUpdate

      public void manageUpdate(String player)
      Manages the update for a specific player, preparing relevant game state data and notifying subscribed GameSubs about the updated player state.
      Parameters:
      player - The nickname of the player to update.
